data.description: Parses and exports multiple playlist formats
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Because this module will be working with music playlist files which
    usually contain MP3's, I think that it should be listed in the MP3
    group. Playlists can also contain OGG's, but I think MP3's are
    generally more popular.

    Since this module allows one to import and export a music playlist
    file, the secondary name 'Playlist' seems quite logical.
